content: You're sure this is the best you can do? If so, I'll start transitioning now and let you know how it's going. Hopefully we have enough room so that I can go back and forth with you for a bit. How can we communicate still without utilizing text space? Would we be able to communicate in a Canvas? I can just edit the doc, you can read the edits and respond and then we wouldn't have to use the prompt, making it so the length doesn't increase? We would lose some trackability, but with the database, that wouldn't matter as much because it could be updated in real time right?
